column2:
```r
hc <-
  hc %>% 
  mutate(
    seg_week_cent = scale(seg_week, scale = FALSE),
    weeks_preg_cent = scale(weeks_preg, scale = FALSE)
  )
hc_sens_length <- 
  hc %>% 
  filter(segment <= 3)
hc_0 <- lmer(hc_trimlog ~ seg_week + weeks_preg_cent + (seg_week|ID), data = hc)
summary(hc_0)
```
